arStrings.szText: {c_important}Meteorites{/c} fall around {c_important}Meteor{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of Meteor's damage on impact. Your {c_important}Meteorites{/c} additionally Burn enemies they hit for {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0 / 100"]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Meteorites{/c} fall around {c_important}Meteor{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of Meteor's damage. Your {c_important}Meteorites{/c} Burn enemies for {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0" / 100]{/c} damage.
